双頭の斧による襲撃事件から数日が経過している。\n日常に戻った学園では穏やかな時:
Several days had passed since the two-headed axe attack.
Time passed peacefully at the school, which had returned to normal.
ねえ、聞いた聞いた！？\nシリウスシュガーが生徒会に表彰されるんだって！:
Hey, did you hear that?!
Sirius Sugaru is going to get an award from the student council!
もちろんよ！ シリウスシュガーの最新情報は、\n常にチェックしてるわ！:
Of course! The latest news about Sirius Sugaru is...
I'm always checking!
ふふ、すっかりシリウスシュガー大好きっ子ねぇ。: Heehee. You really do love Sirius Sugar, don't you?
まあ、それだけお世話になったもの。: Well, that's just how much you've done for me.
同時期にピクシス・マスールのドロテアと\nトレブルクインテットのフルートからある:
Around the same time, with Dorothea of Pixis Masulu
A report was submitted from Treburg-Intette's flute.
それはシリウスシュガーの戦闘能力の高さを評価するというものだ。\n結果、世論から:
That would be to evaluate Sirius Sugaru's combat prowess
As a result, the voices insisting on transferring schools had completely disappeared from public opinion.
ちゆるさんの移籍話も立ち消えになって、本当よかったわ！: I'm so glad Chiyuru-san stopped talking about transferring!
やっと日常が戻ってきた感じがするー。: I feel like my daily life has finally returned.
今日までいろいろと大変でしたからね。: It's been a lot of work up until today.
のんびりお茶でも飲みたいですわね。: I'd love to have a nice, relaxing cup of tea.
いいんじゃないか。しばらくは出撃もないだろうし。: I think it's fine. We won't be deployed for a while.
今はこれからのことをじっくり考える時間がとれたのだと\n前向きに考えておこう。:
That now he had time to think carefully about what to do next
Let's think positively.
先日のＭＧ競技、この２チームは本来の実力が出ていなかった気がする。\n実際、過去:
During the MG competition the other day, I felt like these two teams hadn't shown their true abilities.
As a matter of fact, I had seen past combat records, but all of my strategic tactics were perfect, so it was different this time.
……とノヴァセレスからの宣伝文句です。: ...That's the promotional line from Nova Celes.
（２チームともちゆるの引き抜きについては、\n本意じゃなかったように思える）:
(As for the two teams pulling out Mochiyuru...
I don't think he meant it.)
しかし立場上、所属校区を考えると表向き嫌な顔をしづらかった。\n２チームの結託も:
However, given her position, it was hard to make an unpleasant face on the surface when considering the school district she belonged to.
The collusion between the two teams wasn't really their idea either.
本人達に戦闘自体は手を抜いたつもりがなかったとしても、\n無意識に心の持ち方から:
Even if the people in question didn't intend to go easy on the battle itself,
Unconsciously, he had barely been able to bring out his true power from the way he held his heart.
（モチベーション――想いの力って、無意識でも露骨にパフォーマンスに\n影響を与え:
(Motivation—the power of feelings—even if you're unconscious, it's blatantly put into performance
It'll have an effect. For better or worse.)
（彼女達の本来の実力は、きっと今後見ることになるだろう。\nそのときが楽しみだ）:
(I'm sure I'll be able to see their true abilities in the future.
I'm looking forward to that moment.)
実はずっと聞いていいか悩んでいることがあるんですけど、\nこの際だからちゆるさん:
Actually, there's something I've been wondering about for a long time.
Can I ask Chiyuru-san now?
うん、そうだよ。月ヶ瀬は母方の名前なの。: Yeah, that's right. Tsukigase is my mother's name.
月ヶ瀬もなんだか神秘的でいいけど、龍宮もカッコイイんじゃない？: Tsukigase's kind of mysterious, too, but isn't Ryuugu cool, too?
あはは。ありがとう。\nそんなことを言われたのは初めてだよ。:
Ahaha. Thanks.
This is the first time she's said that to me.
これからは龍宮さんとお呼びすべきかしら？: Should I call you Ryuugu-san from now on?
ちゆるはちゆるだから。好きなように呼んでくれたらいいよ。: You can call me whatever you want.
いきなりあだ名で呼び出すのは、むしろ失礼ではないかしら？\nなので、これまで通り:
Wouldn't it be rather rude to call her by her nickname all of a sudden?
So why don't we do what we've always done?
あははっ、あたしとしても今まで通りがいいかな。\nだって、『いつもどおりのシリウ:
Ahaha, I think I'd like it to be the same as always.
I mean, it feels like "sirius sugar as usual"!
今回の事件を通じてシリウスシュガーの結束は\nより強固なものとなったようだ。:
Through this incident, Sirius Sugaru's unity had grown
Looks like it's gotten stronger.
（双頭の斧。Ｔ元素。そして──俺達の知らない『何か』）: (A two-headed axe. A T element. And something we don't know.)
俺の失われた記憶も、それらの秘密と結びついているのかもしれない。: Maybe my lost memories are connected to those secrets.
まだ答えは遠い。\nけれど、それでも。:
The answer was still far away.
But even so...
（この仲間達との日常を守るためにも、一刻も早く、\nその謎を解き明かさなくちゃな:
(In order to protect my daily life with these friends, I had to do it as soon as possible
I have to solve that mystery...)
